alert.note: Alert for Florence; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 5:57PM EDT until August 01 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Florence County in northeastern South Carolina... Northwestern Williamsburg County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 556 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Florence, Lake City, Timmonsville, Pamplico, Sardis, Hyman, Hannah, Effingham, Cades, Cartersville, Hebron, Friendfield, Claussen, New Hope, Evergreen, Scranton, Coward, Olanta, Lake City Community Hospital and Carolinas Hospital System. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
